fields.name: DisplayTxtNowGoToWOCreateSR_NoFurtherWork
fields.fieldText:
Your service appointment status has been updated to Job Closure.

To continue, click Next, Finish and scroll down to Create Service Report.

*A service report is required to update your status to Visit Complete.

fields.name: DisplayTxtNowGoToWOCreateSR_GotFurtherWork
fields.fieldText:
Your service appointment status has been updated to Job Closure.

To continue, click Next, Finish and scroll down to Create Service Report.

*A service report is required to update your status to Visit Complete.

screens.label: Account Type is Credit or Key

fields.name: DisplayTxtAccounttypeCreditOrKey
fields.fieldText:
As this a credit customer an email has been sent to the client requesting payment. The client has 30 days to pay.

The service appointment status has been updated to Visit Complete.

fields.name: DisplayTxtConfirmWorkType
fields.fieldText: Please confirm if the work type {!var_WorkOrderData.Work_Type_Name__c} added by the booking team was correct:

fields.name: WorkTypeBookingTeamPlease_confirm
fields.fieldText: Please confirm:

fields.name: DisplayTxtConfirmSelectionsMade
fields.fieldText:
Please confirm your selections:

Trade: {!var_SelectedTradeData.Name}

Category: {!var_SelectedGroupData.Name}

Work type: {!var_SelectedWorkTypeData.Name}

fields.name: RadBtnPlease_confirm
fields.fieldText: Please select:

fields.name: DisplayTxtCorrectWorkTypeUpdated
fields.fieldText:
Thank you for your feedback.

Please press next to continue.

fields.name: DisplayTxtEntereNumberHoursForRates
fields.fieldText:
Please enter the number of hours you completed for each rate.

*You should only charge in half hour increments, e.g. 1, 1.5, 2, 2.5 etc

﻿You started work at: {!var_ServApptData.ActualStartTime}

Rate 1 = £{!var_CCTData.Hourly_Charge_R1__c}

fields.fieldText: Rate 1 hours e.g. 1, 1.5, 2, 2.5 etc

fields.fieldText: Rate 3 hours e.g. 1, 1.5, 2, 2.5 etc

The service appointment status has now been updated to Visit Complete.

Please press Next and Finish.

fields.name: DisplayTxtServiceReportNotFound
fields.fieldText: You cannot take a payment without a service report. To continue, click Next, Finish and scroll down to Create Service Report.

fields.name: DisplayTxtServiceReportNotFound_0
fields.fieldText: A service report has not been created. To continue, click Next, Finish and scroll down to Create Service Report.

fields.name: DisplayTxtShowTotalsBookingDiscount
fields.fieldText:
See below an overview of the total charges to the customer, including mark-up. Please select Submit or Amend Totals and click next.

Rate 1 total: £{!FormulaTotalRate1_Booking_Discount} ({!Rate_1_Hours} hours) with {!var_CCTData.Discount_Manual_Percentage__c}% booking discount

Rate 2 total: £{!FormulaTotalRate2_Booking_Discount} ({!Rate_2_Hours} hours) with {!var_CCTData.Discount_Manual_Percentage__c}% booking discount

Rate 3 total: £{!FormulaTotalRate3_Booking_Discount} ({!Rate_3_Hours} hours) with {!var_CCTData.Discount_Manual_Percentage__c}% booking discount

Total for rates: £{!var_GrandTotalsR1R2R3_With_Discount} with {!var_CCTData.Discount_Manual_Percentage__c}% booking discount

Total for materials: £{!FormulaTotal_of_POs_And_OperativeMaterials_With_MarkUp}

Total for fixed price collection fees: £{!var_FixedPriceCollFeesOriginal}

﻿Attendance fee (if applicable): £{!var_AccountAttendanceFee}

ULEZ Charge (if applicable): £{!var_CCTData.Charge_ULEZ__c}

List Price Services: £{!Formula_ListPriceServices_W_BookingDC} with {!var_CCTData.Discount_Manual_Percentage__c}% booking discount

fields.name: Please_confirm_if_you_wish_to_submitBookingDiscount
fields.fieldText: Please confirm:

fields.name: DisplayTxtShowTotalsEngDiscountNoDiscount
fields.fieldText:
See below an overview of the total charges to the customer, including mark-up. Please select Submit or Amend Totals and click next.

Rate 1 total: £{!FormulaTotalRate1_Eng_Discount} ({!Rate_1_Hours} hours) with {!var_PicklistOverride_discount_Number}% discount

Rate 2 total: £{!FormulaTotalRate2_Eng_Discount} ({!Rate_2_Hours} hours) with {!var_PicklistOverride_discount_Number}% discount

Rate 3 total: £{!FormulaTotalRate3_Eng_Discount} ({!Rate_3_Hours} hours) with {!var_PicklistOverride_discount_Number}% discount

Total for rates: £{!var_GrandTotalsR1R2R3_With_Discount}

Total for materials: £{!FormulaTotal_of_POs_And_OperativeMaterials_With_MarkUp}

Total for fixed price collection fees: £{!var_FixedPriceCollFeesOriginal}

Attendance fee (if applicable): £{!var_AccountAttendanceFee}

﻿ULEZ Charge (if applicable): £{!var_CCTData.Charge_ULEZ__c}

List Price Services: £{!Formula_ListPriceServices_W_Eng_DC} with {!var_PicklistOverride_discount_Number}% discount

fields.name: Please_confirm_if_you_wish_to_submitEngDiscountNoDiscount
fields.fieldText: Please confirm:

fields.name: DisplayTxtVisitComplete
fields.fieldText:
The Service Appointment is already in a Status of Visit Complete.

To make any changes now you will need to contact the office.

fields.fieldText:
var_CCTData.Discount_Manual_Percentage__c: {!var_CCTData.Discount_Manual_Percentage__c}

Engineer Discount, (PicklistOverride_discount): {!PicklistOverride_discount}

var_CCTDiscountManualPercentage: {!var_CCTDiscountManualPercentage}
